remarks: Disjunction distributes over the biconditional, for a decidable proposition.  Based on theorem *5.7 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 125.  This theorem is similar to ~ orbididc .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 2-Apr-2018.)
statement: pm5.7dc $p |- ( DECID ch -> ( ( ( ph \/ ch ) <-> ( ps \/ ch ) ) <-> ( ch \/ ( ph <-> ps ) ) ) ) $.
